name: Dungeon Chess (JuriK)
description:
As a team of hero minotaures you are stuck on a chessboard and you must fight a horde of goblins.

Walls are your best friends when you are outnumbered.

You can perform one of two movement actions and one attack move per turn.

This was a programming test.

So anyway, I started jamming.

It is a tiny game demo that can get much bigger, the whole idea was to build a very flexible system that is expandable.
